text: MagicEd Simulation: Welcome! To advance this dialogue use your controller like a laser pointer and click with the trigger
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Let's first make sure you're good to look around
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Please look to the doorway of this courtyard
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Good! Next look at the totem in the corner.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Good! Let's move on
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Take a look at your controllers, they should tell you all the buttons you have
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: If we mention a control and you don't know what or where that is, look at your controllers like that.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Note that your left and right hands have slightly different controls for movement.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Use your joysticks to either move or teleport around this area. Try both out!
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Please do not physically walk, this is how you get hurt.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: When you're ready, cross the bridge to the next courtyard.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Now the fun part! Time to pick things up and put them down.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: We have a bunch of toys here for you, have fun and see what they do!
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Objects can respond to your grip and trigger controls in different ways.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: When you're ready, drop the beanbag into the hole in the beanbag toss board (you can of course try to throw it in)
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn

text: MagicEd Simulation: Whoops! Sorry, that was probably disorienting. Try to stay on the platform.
file: C:\Users\tmcan\Documents\Work\50 SimLabs\Repositories\Sim Template Repository\Simulation Template\Assets\MagicEd Simulation\YAML\Scenes\XR Tutorial\XR Tutorial.yarn
